task.summary: Default task
trying out facebook connect
disabling fbconnect on production site

reverted user pages to spring ui , facebook connect login appears to work, balance is in profile but in milliseconds, added account service stub, can add skills to profile but not checking unique constraint
added error checking and unique constraint to skills addition, balance displaying in hours, based on joda duration
managing many to many properly between skills and users
removed welcome name from front page
fixed bug with saving skills with mysql
added user database
added admin functions to list users and update balances. Added oauth2 plugin
simplified security config

added new fields to user for user addition of current user base, added icons to update balance, made search and user management consistent with the rest of gui, added basic searchable config, file based search
added more fields to the add user page, linked to it from the list people page
added the add and subtract for user balances, added balances to user list, corrected some user profile bugs
improved profile balance format
improved profile balance format on update page
added null check to add and subtract hours
fixed some mysql specific bugs regarding relationships with offered skills and users
very basic profile editing and user creation working now
adding skills now working nicely in profile edit pages
small tidy up
added legacy users import to bootstrap
added some more logging to boostrap import errors
trying fulluserNames in import and changed search engine index path to tomcat home
